findings.message: Overall-confidence in frontmatter (85%) conflicts with the plan's own weighted calculation (88% at line 374), creating metadata inconsistency.
The fail-closed rule only blocks missing/empty sections; it does not enforce the stated five-bullet outcome (lines 69, 152), so a 1–4 bullet regression can still ship.
This still references 'pre-built dist or ts-node,' which conflicts with the corrected source-direct tsx execution model documented later (lines 312, 315, 324).

note: All three warnings fixed after Round 2. No Critical findings present — Round 3 not triggered per iteration rules. Plan is credible (lp_score 4.0).
